quote.msg: 咁勁！
吾爾開希都有份一齊傾？

replies.msg:
有份傾

The same day, he met with democracy activists from across the Taiwan Strait, including Hong Kong bookseller Lam Wing-kee (林榮基), Tiananmen student leader of Uighur origin Wu’er Kaixi (吾爾開希), and Chinese Christian militants Liao Qiang (廖強) and Ren Ruiting (任瑞婷), according to media reports.
